org.walkingarchive.backend.model.security
Class SecurityDAO

java.lang.Object
  org.walkingarchive.backend.model.security.SecurityDAO

public class SecurityDAO
extends java.lang.Object

A singleton responsible for the restoration of User objects from the database, as well as additions, modifications, and deletions of Users in the database.
